definitions.definition: A list of employees who receive salary or wages , together with the amounts due to each .
The total sum of money paid to employees.
The calculation of salaries and wages and the deduction of taxes etc.; the department in a company responsible for this.

main_definition: A list of employees who receive salary or wages , together with the amounts due to each .
secondary_definitions: The total sum of money paid to employees.
( accounting ) The calculation of salaries and wages and the deduction of taxes etc.; the department in a company responsible for this.
